name: Geist Folding
description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) simultaneously to earn GEIST. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Geist Folding
en.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) simultaneously to earn GEIST. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Geist Folding
fr.description: Fournit et emprunte simultanément du {{token}} sur [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) pour gagner des GEIST. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Geist Folding
es.description: Suministra y pide prestado {{token}} en [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) simultáneamente para ganar GEIST. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.name: Geist Folding
de.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) simultaneously to earn GEIST. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

el.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) simultaneously to earn GEIST. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Geist Folding
tr.description: GEIST kazanmak için aynı anda [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit)'a {{token}} sağlar ve ödünç alır. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

vi.name: Geist Folding
vi.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) simultaneously to earn GEIST. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Geist Folding
zh.description: 同时在 [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) 上存入和借出 {{token}} 以赚取 GEIST。收获到的奖励会被卖掉，换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Geist Folding
hi.description: आपूर्ति और उधार {{token}} [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) पर एक साथ GEIST अर्जित करने के लिए। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।

ja.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) simultaneously to earn GEIST. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.
